meanings.sent1: Enterobiasis can cause itching around the anus.
meanings.sent2: Doctors can diagnose enterobiasis by examining stool samples.
meanings.sent3: The pinworms in enterobiasis must really enjoy their cozy home in the intestines.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt like a tangled mess of enterobiasis, with thoughts wriggling around uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was a buzzing hive of enterobiasis, with students squirming in their seats.

meanings.definition: The condition of having pinworms in the intestines.
meanings.sent1: Severe enterobiasis can lead to abdominal pain and discomfort.
meanings.sent2: Enterobiasis is more common in children than in adults.
meanings.sent3: The family picnic turned into a chaotic mess when enterobiasis decided to join the party.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were invaded by enterobiasis, causing a constant distraction.
meanings.sent5: The garden was overrun with enterobiasis, as the pesky pinworms made themselves at home.
